Public MustInherit Class SrgsElement Inherits MarshalByRefObject

Docs.summary: Define a classe base para classes no namespace correspondentes aos elementos em uma gramática SRGS.

remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement> classe é a classe base para as classes a seguir, que correspondem aos elementos definidos na [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de fala (SRGS) versão 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761):
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>
Herdarem de duas classes adicionais de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement> e representam o texto contido dentro das classes listadas acima (SrgsText) e reconhecimento de correspondência de modos (SrgsSubset):
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset>
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText>

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
